data.title: Erotic ni Oborero!
data.title_japanese: エロティックに溺れろ!
data.synopsis: Tomoharu Okabe is starting to work as an illustrator for a popular sensationalist novelist, Tougo Tsubaki. Since Okabe-san is not an established mangaka yet, he is persuaded to illustrate for Tsubaki-sensei. However, this assignment with Tsubaki-sensei ends up more than he ever bargains for. (Source: MU)

data.title: Maniac ni Aishite♥
data.synopsis: Volume 1: Maniac ni Aishite 1-4. Maniac ni Aishite 5. Erotic ni Ijimete! 6. Erotic ni Oborero! (Novel) Volume 2: Chou Maniac ni Aishite Volume 3: Geki Maniac ni Aishite

data.title: Nude na Shisen
data.synopsis: 1-3) Nude na Shisen - Nishitaka, a famous landscape photographer, agrees to do a photo shoot with people, with two conditions- it has to be with the male model Ritsuya and the pictures have to be nudes! This story is continued in Tsumi to Kuchizuke: Nude na Egoist (Ch. 5) 4) Scandalous Lips (A Silky Kiss) - A successful male supermodel, Taiga Ren, agrees to model for a designer, Tsukishima Keiichi, but the price is the designer's body... 5) Lying Lips (Usotsuki na Kuchibiru) - The #1 host at a host club, Takaki Reiichi, has a one night stand with the new #2 host, Suou Akira. He says it was just sex. Was it really? (Source: MU)

data.title: Tsumi to Kuchizuke
data.title_japanese: 罪とくちづけ ‐ 楽園に奪われた十日間‐
title_synonyms: Tsumi to Kuchizuke -Romance ni Ubawareta Toukakan -
data.synopsis: 1. Sins and Kisses (3 chapters) - Tsumi to Kuchizuke When a gentle young man named Yamato is sent to the lush Fiji islands (in place of his brother, Hikaru), it proves to be the perfect setting for passion as he tumbles into an affair with a world class F1 race-car driver, Kyle, who is his brother's (ex-)lover. 2. Impenetrable Lips - Higurashi (Hikaru) gets kissed by Aaron, a famous lady-killer and F1 racer (on the same team as Kyle) and then "kidnapped" (with Yamato's help) to a desert island for their "honeymoon". Will Hikaru believe in Aaron's love? 3. Nude na Egoist - Continuation of "Nude Na Shisen". Nishitaka's birthday is coming and Ritsuya wants to spend it together, but photographers have a lot of work. 4. King's Lesson - Keita lost his job in a modeling agency, but then he's picked up by Tobe Seiichirou (Master), who offers him lessons to become a world-class model. 5. Sins and Kisses - Extra Story - Kyle and Yamato wearing yukata in caravan (trailer). (from B-U)

data.title: Netsubyou
data.synopsis: Feverish 1) Singles Sen is the son of the caretaker of the building where Hashiba lives. Sen started to seduce Hashiba, and even though he didn't give a proper answer, he never rejected Sen's services. 2) Persons Sen and Hashiba started to live together now but they haven't slept together yet.... Feather Hands chapters 3-5 + Extra (from B-U)

data.title: Kimi ni Sachi Are!
data.synopsis: Naruse Sachi left his student ID at Happy Villa. His kouhai, Kunisaki picked it up and wants to return it. But does Kunisaki expect any favor in return? Sachi's cuteness is making Kunisaki all nervous and excited. Will Sachi accept being pursued by this first love of his life, his kouhai, and a guy on top of that? (Source: Attractice Fascinante Scanlations)

data.title: Fortune Fortune
data.title_japanese: フォーチューン・フォーチュン
data.synopsis: Koushirou, a very handsome and wealthy young CEO, is given a "lucky cat" doll by his grandfather. When its little brass tag is touched, the doll-cat changes into a boy with cat ears and tail, who declares he will fulfill every wish of his new master. But Koushirou had no wishes because he is so perfect that he has realized everything by himself already... (Source: MU)

data.title: Fujimi 2-choume Koukyougakudan: Kanrei Zensen Conductor
data.title_japanese: 富士見二丁目交響楽団 寒冷前線コンダクター
data.synopsis: Morimura Yuuki, concertmaster at Fujimi Citizens Orchestra, loves music and his small, amateurish, but tight-knit group at Fujimi. His world is shaken up when a brilliant, new conductor, Tounoin Kei, is recruited to breathe life into their music and orchestra. Yuuki feels Tounoin's high demands will do nothing but chase away the members, but when he draws more from them than they ever thought possible, Yuuki reconsiders his own motives for staying at Fujimi. Obviously, the newcomer Tounoin understands Fujimi more than Yuuki ever did and even has the girl that Yuuki's been in love with for the past three years, at his feet. Nursing a wounded pride Yuuki wants to resign from Fujimi, but Tounoin has other ideas... (Source: MU) Ch. 1-3) Cold Front Conductor [ 寒冷前線コンダクター], Vols. 1-3 Ch. 4-5) Do You Like the Concert?, Vols. 1-2 Based on the novel series by Kou Akizuki and illustrated by Sei Gotoh, in honor of the 10-year anniversary of the original novel.

data.title: Gakuen Heaven: Nakajima-hen
data.title_japanese: 学園ヘヴン 中嶋編
data.synopsis: This version of Gakuen Heaven follows the same period of time and events as the original Gakuen Heaven anime, as well as the alternative versions of the manga, but changes the story enough so that Nakajima is the one who wins Keita Itou's heart.
data.background: Gakuen Heaven: Nakajima-hen was published in English as Gakuen Heaven: Nakajima by Tokyopop's Blu Manga imprint on June 16, 2009.

data.title: Lonely Soldier
data.title_japanese: LONELY SOLDIER ロンリーソルジャー
data.synopsis: High school student Nanao has been having a series of reoccurring dreams about a German soldier standing alone in the middle of a battlefield. After his parents' tragic death, Nanao transfers to a new school and is immediately drawn to Haruka, a student who looks suspiciously like the soldier in his dreams. But Haruka's not very friendly... and to make matters even worse, he seems to be already involved with a boy from a neighboring school. When Nanao tells both boys about his dreams, they seem unnerved. Do they just think he's crazy, or is it possibly that they share them? (Source: DokiDoki Scanlations)

data.title: Gurechawanaidene
data.synopsis: Tsukishita is completely dependant on his little brother. It's the first day of school and his little brother has already had to find Tsukishita with the things he's forgotten. When a group of girls try to help him find his older brother, they mistakenly think he's Kagumi's. When Kagumi realizes who he is he also remembers the day he confessed to Tsukishita. Tsukishita offhandedly said some heartless things to Kagumi; did he really mean them the way it sounded? (Source: MU)

data.title: Mitsuyaku
data.synopsis: Set in Japan during the '20s, Mitsuyaku is the story of two childhood friends from very different walks of life who grow up to become lovers. Yuuichi is an ambitious type from humble beginnings, working his way towards success. His beloved Iori is the scion of an important family, a beautiful, dark-haired creature with a gentle nature. Unfortunately, one of the aspects of belonging to an important lineage is marriage. Will the hero have the guts to stay with the love of his life, or will he succumb to his family's pressure to shore up the dwindling finances by marrying rich? (Source: MU)

data.title: Koi wa Keiyaku no Ato de
data.synopsis: 1. Koi wa Keiyaku no Ato de (Love After Contract I) 2. Happy End wa Owaranai (Love After Contract II) 3. Kiss no Shohousen (Kiss Prescription I) 4. Kiss no Kouishou (Kiss Prescription II) 5. Koi wo Suru ni wa Chikasugiru (Too Close For Love)

data.title: Happy Play
data.synopsis: Collection of oneshots. 9 in total. Some light S&M, bondage and toy action. 1) Happy Play: In an attempt to tease a classmate he dislikes, Fujihisa made a love confession to Narumi out of the blue. Fujihisa just wanted to see what a panicked expression on the usually cool and calm Narumi looked like. 2) Work the Other Way Around: Student Kazumi is jealous of his older lover Sakae's attention to others. But the school counselor has eyes only for Kazumi, and a gift for hypnotism... 3) Earned Run: School idol Haru is gentle to everyone except his lover, Tomo. Only Tomo knows the cruel, perverted side to Haru, but is that a bad thing? 4) Diary Exchange: Yuuta and Iori are lovers, coworkers and roommates. But naive Yuuta is always being manipulated by the perverted Iori. 5) Daily Jealous Innocents: A college student's obsession with his expressionless classmate leads to S&M. 6) OK! Baby! Hana is an office worker being blackmailed into a sexual relationship by a perverted but childish doctor. 7) Profitable Secret: Seitarou insists on keeping his relationship with Kazuya a secret, but Kazuya is tired of Seitarou's coldness at school. 8)Fake: That's not where your cell phone goes. (from B-U)

data.title: Heart
data.synopsis: How far would you go to discover the mystery behind a smile? Kouhei has been watching Akira-senpai for quite some time. When Akira finally takes notice of him, how much of his cruelty will Kouhei withstand in order to win his heart? (Source: Loveless)

data.title: Hitorijime Theory
title_synonyms: Hokorobu no wa Dare no Tame
Thank You for Taking Care of Me
data.synopsis: Series of oneshots, some of which feature recurring characters. 1. Hitorijime Theory (Theory of Monopoly) 2. Koi Ochi Rule (Rules of Falling in Love) 3. Mitsugetsu Rule (Rules of Engagement) 4. Special Extra 5. Hokorobu no wa Dare no Tame (Smile for You) 6. Osewa ni Natte Orimasu (Thank You for Taking Care of Me)

data.title: Ijiwaru na Kuchibiru
data.synopsis: A collection of one-shots. 1. Ijiwaru na Kuchibiru (Ill-Natured Lip) 2. Ienai Junjou (Unspeakable Innocence) 3. Otonari-san (Neighbor Love) 4. Sokubaku no Kagi (The Key of Bonds) 5. Kiss wa Mitsu yori Amaku (A Kiss Sweeter Than Honey) 6. Mujaki na Egao (Innocent Smile)

data.title: Inu to Omawari-san.
data.synopsis: Dog-complex policeman, Miyoshi, was captivated by the popular model, Kanae, who always looks like a stray dog. However, Kanae never paid attention to him, until a day Miyoshi managed to get close to him thanks to an incident. Will the love of these two naïve people be able to go smoothly? (Source: MU) Included one-shot: Volume 2: Happy Man

data.title: Crimson
data.synopsis: In this universe, there are four worlds: Meikai, the center of the universe, Ninkai, the human world, Youkai, where monsters with shape-shifting forms live, and Shintenkai, the world of the Celestials. Shiba Yukinari is one of the few who are born of both Youkai and Celestial blood - during the day, he works as a detective, but also has the job of exterminating youkai. As he works collecting 'cores', or a youkai's source of power, he meets Riifei who that demands that Yukinari hand over his own 'core'... Vol.1 Crimson Vol.2 Crimson Crown Vol.3 Crimson Chaos (from B-U)

data.title: Kimi dake ni Focus
data.synopsis: Kyoutarou is an up-and-coming photographer who is given the opportunity of a lifetime to shoot an ad campaign with his idol. But when one of his models calls out sick, it looks like he'll lose his chance. But who's that stunning guy arranging the flowers? (Source: MU)

data.title: Isso Mou, Kudokitai!
data.title_japanese: いっそもう、くどきたい！
data.synopsis: Ayukawa has had nothing but trouble with women, from his first crush to the last girl that dumped him, so he's given up on getting a girlfriend. Now he's teaching at an all boys school and his cute student Hino is very friendly. Is a boyfriend the answer to Ayukawa's love troubles? (from B-U)

data.title: Love Neco
data.synopsis: A new twist on the "love doll" genre. Tempted by an internet advertisement for a "Necoco" doll series, Eiji orders one on a whim, imagining a moe-tastic hadaka-apron-wearing girl to show up on his doorstep. Instead he gets a scrappy looking boy, and to make matters worse...he's an aggressive, tough-talking little brat. (Source: MU) Included one-shot: Good Awakening to the Master

data.title: Yakudate Seishun
data.synopsis: 1) Yakudate Seishun Komori Atsuhiro loves his job cleaning, especially for the sexy writer Haidamaki Munesan. 2) Sakura Iro Mayama has always admired his boss Taki Buchou, but now he's having sexy dreams about him? 3) Shisen no Toriko Because of a unique psychological condition due to a childhood trauma, Chigara decides to become a nude male model. But will the teacher of the class Ozu Makoto get a reaction out of him? 4) Anata no Te no Ue Enami Hiro just got a job and a collection agent and he's terrible at it! The guy he's supposed to collect from is giving him the run around. Can soft-hearted Hiro make the guy pay up? 5) Mujaki ni Wagamama When doctor Yamagami Seiichi causes the accident that breaks snowboarder Nozuru Motomu's leg, he devotes himself to his care. But Nozuru acts like a spoiled brat, albeit a very cute one... 6) Kimi wa Boku no Extra from chapter one: Komori head home and brings a reluctant Haida with him. (from B-U)

data.title: Yasashiku Sokubaku Shiteageru
data.synopsis: Cameraman, Ooshiro Yutaka's heart has just been broken. Shortly afterwards, he encounters actor, Itou Naoya. He's attracted to his image of a naked innocence and the role that the gap in front of the camera plays. He begins to approach that gap, but when it's time to take pictures for a commercial campaign, Ooshiro finds kiss marks all over Nao's body. Bothered by his feelings of betrayal, Ooshiro realizes for the first time his deep feelings for Nao. But where does he go from here? (from B-U)

data.title: Kimi to Harujion
data.synopsis: Haru Akaishi's father has just died, leaving him an orphan at age 17. It seems his father was in a lot of debt and took out some shady loans, and just when the Yakuza-esque creditors come to collect, a mysterious lawyer named Yuuji Senoh appears and says he'll deal with the matter personally. As it turns out, Mr. Senoh was someone Haru befriended many years ago as his mother ailed in the hospital, but Haru has forgotten about him. When the bank takes back the mortgage on his house, Haru takes Mr. Senoh up on his offer to live at his apartment. While Mr. Senoh claims that he's only trying to offer financial support to Haru as a minor, perhaps there is a stronger bond between the two than either realize at first. (Source: MU)
